When: September 2013 - August 2014
Role: Project Assistant at Electricity Research Centre
Where: University College Dublin, Dublin, Ireland
What: • Interdisciplinary undergraduate research group (21 students) that conducted research about the introduction of the smart grid by interviewing academic and industrial stakeholders, reviewing international academic papers and published best practise and learnings and conducting face-to-face interviews with individual consumers (300) in Ireland.
• We published our recommendations in the white paper "Participating in Ireland's smart energy future" which was presented to government at a formal presentation evening.
